items.title: Raymond James upgrades two Nvidia derivative plays following the chipmaker's big AI conference
items.description: Two stocks could be set up for upside moves on the heels of Nvidia's annual GPU Technology Conference, according to Raymond James.

items.title: Bank of America says this under-the-radar Baby Boomer and energy tech play has 40% upside
items.description: The bank initiated coverage of Generac on Monday with a $182 stock price target, implying potential 12-month upside of nearly 40%.

items.title: Deutsche Bank upgrades satellite stock that competes with Elon Musk's Starlink
items.description: A satellite communications giant could be poised for growth in the coming months, according to Deutsche Bank.

items.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, IBM, Microsoft, Boeing, Netflix, Nucor, & more
items.description: Here are the biggest calls on Wall Street on Monday.

items.title: Goldman Sachs downgrades Super Micro, calls for more than 20% downside from here
items.description: Rising competition in the artificial intelligence server space could lead to a pullback in Super Micro Computer shares, according to Goldman Sachs.
